resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
anthonylouisbsb opened a new pull request #10477:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10477


   It adds a function in CMake to retrieve the used version of the `utf8proc` library and sets a required version to be used by CMake.
   
   The PR complements the [10468](https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10468) one, that fixed the bug related to broken builds in Ubuntu 18.04


--

kou commented on a change in pull request #10477:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10477#discussion_r647103927



##########
File path: cpp/cmake_modules/Findutf8proc.cmake
##########
@@ -15,6 +15,31 @@
 # specific language governing permissions and limitations
 # under the License.
 
+function(EXTRACT_UTF8PROC_VERSION)
+  if(utf8proc_INCLUDE_DIR)
+    file(READ "${utf8proc_INCLUDE_DIR}/utf8proc.h" UTF8PROC_H_CONTENT)
+
+    string(REGEX MATCH "#define UTF8PROC_VERSION_MAJOR [0-9]+" UTF8PROC_MAJOR_VERSION_DEFINITION
+            "${UTF8PROC_H_CONTENT}")
+    string(REGEX MATCH "#define UTF8PROC_VERSION_MINOR [0-9]+" UTF8PROC_MINOR_VERSION_DEFINITION
+            "${UTF8PROC_H_CONTENT}")
+    string(REGEX MATCH "#define UTF8PROC_VERSION_PATCH [0-9]+" UTF8PROC_PATCH_VERSION_DEFINITION
+            "${UTF8PROC_H_CONTENT}")
+
+    string(REGEX MATCH " [0-9.]+" UTF8PROC_MAJOR_VERSION "${UTF8PROC_MAJOR_VERSION_DEFINITION}")
+    string(REGEX MATCH " [0-9.]+" UTF8PROC_MINOR_VERSION "${UTF8PROC_MINOR_VERSION_DEFINITION}")
+    string(REGEX MATCH " [0-9.]+" UTF8PROC_PATCH_VERSION "${UTF8PROC_PATCH_VERSION_DEFINITION}")
+
+    string(STRIP "${UTF8PROC_MAJOR_VERSION}" UTF8PROC_MAJOR_VERSION)
+    string(STRIP "${UTF8PROC_MINOR_VERSION}" UTF8PROC_MINOR_VERSION)
+    string(STRIP "${UTF8PROC_PATCH_VERSION}" UTF8PROC_PATCH_VERSION)
+
+    set(UTF8PROC_VERSION "${UTF8PROC_MAJOR_VERSION}.${UTF8PROC_MINOR_VERSION}.${UTF8PROC_PATCH_VERSION}" PARENT_SCOPE)

Review comment:
       Could you use `utf8proc_` prefix for variable that is exported because this package's name is `utf8proc`?
   
   ```suggestion
       set(utf8proc_VERSION "${UTF8PROC_MAJOR_VERSION}.${UTF8PROC_MINOR_VERSION}.${UTF8PROC_PATCH_VERSION}" PARENT_SCOPE)
   ```

##########
File path: cpp/cmake_modules/Findutf8proc.cmake
##########
@@ -15,6 +15,31 @@
 # specific language governing permissions and limitations
 # under the License.
 
+function(EXTRACT_UTF8PROC_VERSION)

Review comment:
       Could you use lower case because we use lower case for function call?
   
   ```suggestion
   function(extract_utf8proc_version)
   ```




--

kou commented on a change in pull request #10477:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10477#discussion_r647134079



##########
File path: cpp/cmake_modules/Findutf8proc.cmake
##########
@@ -15,6 +15,36 @@
 # specific language governing permissions and limitations
 # under the License.
 
+function(extract_utf8proc_version)
+  if(utf8proc_INCLUDE_DIR)
+    file(READ "${utf8proc_INCLUDE_DIR}/utf8proc.h" UTF8PROC_H_CONTENT)
+
+    string(REGEX MATCH "#define UTF8PROC_VERSION_MAJOR [0-9]+"
+                 UTF8PROC_MAJOR_VERSION_DEFINITION "${UTF8PROC_H_CONTENT}")
+    string(REGEX MATCH "#define UTF8PROC_VERSION_MINOR [0-9]+"
+                 UTF8PROC_MINOR_VERSION_DEFINITION "${UTF8PROC_H_CONTENT}")
+    string(REGEX MATCH "#define UTF8PROC_VERSION_PATCH [0-9]+"
+                 UTF8PROC_PATCH_VERSION_DEFINITION "${UTF8PROC_H_CONTENT}")
+
+    string(REGEX MATCH " [0-9.]+" UTF8PROC_MAJOR_VERSION
+                 "${UTF8PROC_MAJOR_VERSION_DEFINITION}")
+    string(REGEX MATCH " [0-9.]+" UTF8PROC_MINOR_VERSION
+                 "${UTF8PROC_MINOR_VERSION_DEFINITION}")
+    string(REGEX MATCH " [0-9.]+" UTF8PROC_PATCH_VERSION
+                 "${UTF8PROC_PATCH_VERSION_DEFINITION}")
+
+    string(STRIP "${UTF8PROC_MAJOR_VERSION}" UTF8PROC_MAJOR_VERSION)
+    string(STRIP "${UTF8PROC_MINOR_VERSION}" UTF8PROC_MINOR_VERSION)
+    string(STRIP "${UTF8PROC_PATCH_VERSION}" UTF8PROC_PATCH_VERSION)

Review comment:
       Can we simplify them?
   
   ```suggestion
       string(REGEX MATCH "[0-9.]+" UTF8PROC_MAJOR_VERSION
                    "${UTF8PROC_MAJOR_VERSION_DEFINITION}")
       string(REGEX MATCH "[0-9.]+" UTF8PROC_MINOR_VERSION
                    "${UTF8PROC_MINOR_VERSION_DEFINITION}")
       string(REGEX MATCH "[0-9.]+" UTF8PROC_PATCH_VERSION
                    "${UTF8PROC_PATCH_VERSION_DEFINITION}")
   ```




--

+
+    string(REGEX MATCH "#define UTF8PROC_VERSION_MAJOR [0-9]+"

Review comment:
       @kou I tried that approach, but it retrieved the 8 in `UTF8PROC` that is at [line's start](https://github.com/JuliaStrings/utf8proc/blob/462093b3924c7491defc67fda4bc7a27baf9b088/utf8proc.h#L72)

##########
File path: cpp/cmake_modules/Findutf8proc.cmake
##########
@@ -15,6 +15,36 @@
 # specific language governing permissions and limitations
 # under the License.
 
+function(extract_utf8proc_version)
+  if(utf8proc_INCLUDE_DIR)
+    file(READ "${utf8proc_INCLUDE_DIR}/utf8proc.h" UTF8PROC_H_CONTENT)
+
+    string(REGEX MATCH "#define UTF8PROC_VERSION_MAJOR [0-9]+"
+                 UTF8PROC_MAJOR_VERSION_DEFINITION "${UTF8PROC_H_CONTENT}")
+    string(REGEX MATCH "#define UTF8PROC_VERSION_MINOR [0-9]+"
+                 UTF8PROC_MINOR_VERSION_DEFINITION "${UTF8PROC_H_CONTENT}")
+    string(REGEX MATCH "#define UTF8PROC_VERSION_PATCH [0-9]+"
+                 UTF8PROC_PATCH_VERSION_DEFINITION "${UTF8PROC_H_CONTENT}")
+
+    string(REGEX MATCH " [0-9.]+" UTF8PROC_MAJOR_VERSION
+                 "${UTF8PROC_MAJOR_VERSION_DEFINITION}")
+    string(REGEX MATCH " [0-9.]+" UTF8PROC_MINOR_VERSION
+                 "${UTF8PROC_MINOR_VERSION_DEFINITION}")
+    string(REGEX MATCH " [0-9.]+" UTF8PROC_PATCH_VERSION
+                 "${UTF8PROC_PATCH_VERSION_DEFINITION}")
+
+    string(STRIP "${UTF8PROC_MAJOR_VERSION}" UTF8PROC_MAJOR_VERSION)
+    string(STRIP "${UTF8PROC_MINOR_VERSION}" UTF8PROC_MINOR_VERSION)
+    string(STRIP "${UTF8PROC_PATCH_VERSION}" UTF8PROC_PATCH_VERSION)

Review comment:
       Ah, OK. How about this?
   
   ```suggestion
       string(REGEX MATCH "[0-9]+$" UTF8PROC_MAJOR_VERSION
                    "${UTF8PROC_MAJOR_VERSION_DEFINITION}")
       string(REGEX MATCH "[0-9]+$" UTF8PROC_MINOR_VERSION
                    "${UTF8PROC_MINOR_VERSION_DEFINITION}")
       string(REGEX MATCH "[0-9]+$" UTF8PROC_PATCH_VERSION
                    "${UTF8PROC_PATCH_VERSION_DEFINITION}")
   ```

fields.summary: [C++] Add a check for the utf8proc's version in CMake
